article: Some people are lucky enough to be born with a good sense of direction and even if they have only visited a place once, they will be able to find it again years later. I am one of those unfortunate people who have  _  sense of direction and I may have visited a place time after time but I still get  _  on my way there. When I was young I was so  _  that I never dared ask strangers the way and so I used to  _  round in circles and hope that I would happen to get to the place I was heading for.
